00007 int main(){
00008         string tes = "3.44+6*6-(6/3)%8";
00009         string operatorx[10];
00010         float bil[10];
00011         int cbil = 0;
00012         int coperator = 0;
00013         cout<<"Mulai"<<endl;
00014         while(tes.length()!=0)
00015         {
00016                 //temp = "";
00017                 char *temp =  new char[30];
00018         
00019                 temp[0] = '@';
00020                 int ctemp = 0;
00021                 while(tes[0] == '1' || tes[0] == '2' || tes[0] == '3' || tes[0] == '4' || tes[0] == '5'
00022                 || tes[0] == '6'|| tes[0] == '7' || tes[0] == '8' || tes[0] == '9' || tes[0] == '.')
00023                 {       
00024                         //temp.append(tes.substr(0,1));
00025                         temp[ctemp] = tes[0];
00026                         tes.erase(0,1);
00027                         ctemp++;
00028                 }
00029                 if(temp[0] !='@')
00030                 {       
00031                         bil[cbil] = atof(temp);
00032                         cbil++;
00033                 }
00034                 if(tes[0] == '+' || tes[0] == '-' || tes[0] == '*' || tes[0] == '/' || tes[0] == '%' || tes[0] == '('|| tes[0] == ')')
00035                 {
00036                         operatorx[coperator] = tes.substr(0,1);
00037                         tes.erase(0,1);
00038                         coperator++;
00039                 }
00040         }
00041         cout<<"Stack bilangan"<<endl;
00042         for(int i = 0;i<=cbil-1;i++)
00043         {
00044                 cout<<i<<"). "<<bil[i]<<endl;
00045         }
00046         cout<<"Stack operator"<<endl;
00047         for(int j = 0;j<=coperator-1;j++)
00048         {
00049                 cout<<j<<"). "<<operatorx[j]<<endl;
00050         }
00051 }
